product_name: Black Diamond Long Flex Center Bars - Pair
long_description: These Black Diamond long flex center bars adapt your Black Diamond crampons (sold separately) to fit boots up to size 15. Flexible spring-steel center bars enhance comfort and mobility while walking on snow and ice. Bars replace left and right connecting bars. Compatible with all current Black Diamond crampons.
short_description: These Black Diamond long flex center bars adapt your Black Diamond crampons (sold separately) to fit boots up to size 15.
